title: Show & Sell
subtitle: Sell your products or services on Facebook with this easy-to-configure social mini-store.
bells_whistles: Perfect for adding a product showcase to your Facebook Page, our Show & Sell app allows you to display up to 10 featured items with unique "Buy Now" links and social commenting plug-ins. Viral functionality of the app ensures your products are spread wide, increasing sales, and social engagement with your brand.

features.title: Buy Now Button
features.description: Add links to your eCommerce site so your Facebook fans are one click away from your online store.

features.title: Customizable Header
features.description: An optional customizable and linkable header, turned on/off via the Content Management Panel, allows for important brand impressions.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.
